name: Cheese Quest (Bärenfrau, MissAvery, Its_DizzyIzzy, Lalasagna)
description:
Cheese🧀Quest is a top-down roguelite inspired by games like Moonlighter and Binding of Isaac. 

You play as Mausi the magic mouse, fighting her way through a cave to collect everything you need to make the best cheese in the Universe. Slay monsters and collect items to upgrade your tent with all the equipment you need.

Controls:


This is our first complete game, we made it in roughly 4 months for a Uni course.
